nodes.text: Hestun was a Human male admiral of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

During the battle of Corellia, Hestun enlisted the help of an Imperial hero to target the Republic's anti-air defenses so that his fleet could bombard the emplacements in Coronet City's Government District. The Admiral was not permitted to bomb the entire sector—the Emperor himself wanted the Legislature intact. The hero was successful and Hestun's men accurately targeted the emplacements, but the Republic retained a foothold in the Drall Library despite their loss.
